sources.title: Haunted Ranch
sources.description: The Range Busters and the bad guys race to find hidden gold bullion at a haunted ranch.

sources.title: Haunted Ranch (1943) THE RANGE BUSTERS
sources.description:
Stars: John 'Dusty' King, David Sharpe, Max Terhune
 Director: Robert Emmett Tansey

 Both the Range Buster and Rance and his outlaw gang are looking for stolen gold bullion. To scare people away from the ranch where the gold is hidden, Rance has his man imitating ghosts. The gold is in a steel cased organ but a certain combination of organ stops need to be pulled to obtain the gold.

metadata.Plot: Both the Range Busters and Rance and his outlaw gang are looking for stolen gold bullion.
